request.description:
**Endpoint**: GET /payroll_action_notice

**Description**: Returns ListLookupItems

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/payroll-action-notice/process

**Method**: GET

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/payroll-action-notice/process' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
{
    "record_count": "1",
    "records": [
        {
            "id": 1000000,
            "table_name": "HR_Process",
            "values": {
                "KeyColumn": 1000000,
                "DisplayColumn": "800003-qweqwe",
                "UUID": "6436b891-b916-4263-b6c8-da115760020f"
            },
            "is_active": true
        }
    ],
    "next_page_token": ""
}

 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /payroll_action_notice

**Description**: Returns Entity

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/payroll-action-notice/process/{payroll_process_id}/concepts/{id}

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Params)**

payroll_process_id (Int32, Mandatory)

id (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/payroll-action-notice/process/1000001/concepts/1000000' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8'

 ```

**Example Answer**

``` json
 {
    "id": 1000000,
    "table_name": "HR_Concept",
    "values": {
        "HR_Concept_ID": 1000000,
        "UUID": "415c60a5-f0c6-447d-be47-95276112e30b",
        "Name": "1000000",
        "Type": "C",
        "ColumnType": "Q",
        "AD_Reference_ID": 0,
        "AD_Reference_ID_UUID": null
    }
}

 ```

**Common mistakes**

- The payroll process ID does not match any of the records.
    

``` json
{
    "code": 13,
    "message": "Concepto NÃ³mina. * No encontrado *",
    "details": []
}
 ```

**Change control**

| **Version** | date | author | Description of Changes |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1.0 | 15/03/2024 | Ricardo | Initial creation of the document. |

**Endpoint**: GET /payroll_action_notice

**Description**: Returns Empty

**FULL URL**: [http://api.adempiere.io](http://api.adempiere.io/api)/payroll-action-notice/delete-movements

**Method**: GET

**Parameters (Body)**

ids (Int32, Mandatory)

**Application Example**

``` bash
curl --location 'http://api.adempiere.io/payroll-action-notice/delete-movements' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9.eyJqdGkiOiIxMDAwMTU0IiwiQURfQ2xpZW50X0lEIjoxMSwiQURfT3JnX0lEIjo1MDAwNiwiQURfUm9sZV9JRCI6MTAyLCJBRF9Vc2VyX0lEIjoxMDAsIk1fV2FyZWhvdXNlX0lEIjowLCJBRF9MYW5ndWFnZSI6ImVzX01YIiwiaWF0IjoxNzEwNzE1NzAxLCJleHAiOjE3MTA4MDIxMDF9.sdizIymo1Yd8P8w4D4ORu2EfavUfgxsPPfQIJMNJQQ8' \
--data '{
    "ids":1000001
}'

 ```

**Example Answer**

```
{}
 ```
